notes: Jeff: It was a 15 minute ordeal to get Ace of Base cued up.
Dan on Tyler Perry: There must have been a lot of post it notes in that fridge, because he labels everything.
Adam Goldberg must have loved that dot connection.
Dan: This crowd is crazy.  Someone gave me the thumbs down, and then gave me the finger.
Dan and Jeff were hanging with Eric Idle and Adam Goldberg was there.  He asked him for his card.  Adam storms the stage to defend himself.
Adam offers Ritalin to Dan.  Jeff tells Dan to take a seat when Adam takes over the show.
At one point in the evening with Eric Idle, Adam started reading an antiwar poem off of his phone.
Adam social engineered Erin's phone number.
Adam: Jeff has a good three or four feet on me vertically.  Jeff: ...and horizontal.  Dan laughs.  "You just look like a t-square."

Adam has muscular dystrophy and scoliosis.  His spine "looks like a question mark, and the question is, how did Adam miss that social cue?"  Adam: "Adam's spine looks so crooked it makes Jeff look straight.  Yuk, yuk."  Adam says that's for Jeff getting 50 retweets of a picture of Adam, saying, "This is the face of Asperger's."

Adam says "birfday" like Will Smith.
Spencer to the Stage.
Dan finally gets back on tangent about airport security: They're dicks.  "Do you really think they're gonna do another 9/11?"
Dan: Al Qaeda is retarded, meaning capable of anything.
End of DND.
Dan talks about his trip to Erin's brother's wedding.  Dumb wedding games.  "Guess whose shoe/leg."
Jeff first plays musical stings with Mary Mac and Walking the Dog.
Dan: Airports, tangent, what's up with this Tyler Perry guy?  The black Ernest.  Did he save Christmas, Nti?
Erin calls Dan's phone while he's on stage to ask if he wants her to be on DND.
Dennis from Rockford, IL asks a question.
Erin storms the stage in Adam Goldbergian fashion.
Spencer jumps right into DND after Jeff calls Erin a cocksucker.
Agee plays Marcus -- er, Morris -- Goldbright, whose friends were all slaughtered.
Spencer recaps DND.
Dan's complaint: his moustache is too absorbent.  He doesn't feel anything, then goes to kiss Erin, and it's like a sponge.
Dan: There was no Harmontown for a few weeks, because they were at Erin's brother's wedding in North Carolina.
Steve Agee to the stage!
